item.title: CVE-2021-24424|2024-08-03T19:28:23.976Z -- unknown -- wp%20reset%20%E2%80%93%20most%20advanced%20wordpress%20reset%20tool
item.description: The WP Reset – Most Advanced WordPress Reset Tool WordPress plugin before 1.90 did not sanitise or escape its extra_data parameter when creating a snapshot via the admin dashboard, leading to an authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue
